issue.title: Let users change their view in the world in more diverse ways

content.raw:
What am I, an elephant ([they never forget](http://cdn.iwastesomuchtime.com/March-13-2012-17-39-09-We5vc.jpeg))? I can't remember what I did three days ago, let alone what I meant by this three years ago ;) 

I believe "Center All" would put the camera in the estimated center of all the models in the scene. Not sure now how useful this would actually be. 
Box Zoom would be a way to zoom in on a specific area by clicking and dragging around the desired target. Doing so would draw a box around the area, and then zoom in on it (maybe center the view on that area?). We can discuss this more. 
Last View was meant as a kind of Undo for the camera view. If you do something weird and end up upside down or otherwise disoriented, this would return you to the last view you have. This is probably not necessary. Reset View is enough, and once we have Undo, perhaps Undoing would undo a camera view change?
